column3:
There is also an overflow problem with ParseMoney.
Maybe this should be fixed in the same time.

```
"10000000000"   -> Parse and Format -> "10,000,000,000.00"  (ok)
"100000000000"  -> Parse and Format -> "-84,467,440,737.09551616" (not ok)
"1000000000000" -> Parse and Format -> "77,662,796,314.5224192" (not ok)
```

etc.

Of course there is this limit of ~21 MBTC, but I think it's safe
